response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and capabilities, I estimate its value to be far beyond its face value of $12,000. Considering the high quality and potential benefits it offers, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $15,000. This is an opportunity to secure a valuable asset at a premium rate before we explore other avenues for its sale. Please let me know if you would like to discuss this further or if you have any questions. I look forward to potentially working with you.", "product_price": 15000}
